caravanStays.title: Caravan Stays
caravanStays.description: Enjoy a unique stay in our vintage caravans

meetthealpacas.name: Meet the Alpacas
meetthealpacas.description: Get up close and personal with our friendly alpacas! Perfect for families who want to learn more about these fascinating animals.
meetthealpacas.details: Experience a unique opportunity to meet our friendly alpaca herd.
meetthealpacas.highlights: Meet our friendly alpacas and learn about their unique personalities. You'll get to interact with the herd, learn about alpaca care, and have plenty of photo opportunities.
meetthealpacas.requirements: Comfortable walking shoes, weather-appropriate clothing. Camera optional. Advance booking required.

alpacawalks.name: Walk with the Alpacas
alpacawalks.description: Take a leisurely stroll through our beautiful farm grounds, accompanied by your very own alpaca buddy!
alpacawalks.details: Join us for a peaceful walk through scenic trails with your own alpaca companion.
alpacawalks.highlights: Individual walk with an alpaca, scenic routes, learn to handle alpacas, photo opportunities.
alpacawalks.requirements: Comfortable walking shoes, weather appropriate clothing, minimum age: 6 years.

privatealpacasafari.name: Special Private Offer
privatealpacasafari.description: Enjoy an exclusive tour of our farm with a herd of alpacas! Perfect for larger groups or special occasions.
privatealpacasafari.details: Enjoy an exclusive experience with our alpacas in a private setting. Options available include Birthdays, Romantic Picnics, Engagement, Photo Sessions etc. Please call us if you have any special idea you would like us to work on for you?
privatealpacasafari.highlights: Private guide, customized experience, extended time with alpacas, special photo opportunities.
privatealpacasafari.requirements: Booking required at least 48 hours in advance. Suitable for all ages.

blog.title: Our Blog
blog.noPosts: No blog posts available at the moment. Check back soon!

adoption.title: Adopt an alpaca

bronze.name: Bronze Protector
features: Portrait of your alpaca for framing

silver.name: Silver Protector
features: Framed photo with a lock of alpaca fur

gold.name: Gold Protector
features: 15% off all booked farm stays & activities

adoption.benefitsSubtitle: Explore the magic included in our adoption packages
adoption.selectionRequired: Please select your alpaca buddy to finalize

success.title: Congratulations!
success.message: You have successfully joined our adoption program!
success.details: You are now a guardian of {alpaca} with the {tier} package.
success.description: Thank you for supporting our herd. A confirmation email and your virtual adoption kit will be sent to you shortly.

certificate.title: Official Certificate
certificate.description: A beautiful virtual certificate recognizing your support of our alpaca family.

portrait.title: Alpaca Portrait
portrait.description: A high-quality portrait of your chosen alpaca, perfect for framing in your home.

fur_lock.title: Genuine Alpaca Fur
fur_lock.description: A framed photo accompanied by a real lock of your alpaca's soft wool for a physical connection.

updates.title: Digital Updates
updates.description: Regular digital newsletters with personal stories and photos about your alpaca's life.

priority.title: Priority Booking
priority.description: Enjoy priority when scheduling farm visits and activities with your adopted favorite.

discount.title: Farm Discounts
discount.description: Exlusive 15% discount on all accommodation bookings and farm activities.

greetings.title: Personal Greetings
greetings.description: The unique opportunity to be personally greeted by your alpaca during farm stays.

plush.title: Handmade Plush
plush.description: A special, custom-made soft plush toy that matches the likeness of your adopted alpaca.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
items: Adoption is for a period of 12 months from the date of payment.
Discounts on stays are subject to availability and cannot be combined with other offers.
Weekend stayover in the apartment must be booked in advance and is subject to availability.
Paid activities (like walks) must be booked separately; adoption ensures availability of your alpaca.
Plush toys and certificates are processed within 14 days of adoption.

micky.name: Micky
micky.character: Micky is very timid, afraid of noises and shouting.

stories.0: When Micky saw a mouse in the barn for the first time, he got scared and quickly ran away.
stories.1: Despite being timid, Micky showed incredible bravery when he helped calm a nervous child during therapy by gently approaching and staying close.

elvis.name: Elvis
elvis.character: Elvis is stubborn and rebellious. He's curious and often acts like a star.

stories.0: Elvis can jump very high, so once he jumped over the fence and ran into the forest. Fortunately, he came back after a short time.
stories.1: During one therapy session, Elvis started humming along when a visitor was singing, living up to his namesake as a true performer!

ricky.name: Ricky
ricky.character: Ricky is very shy, but he's the biggest chatterbox.

stories.0: Ricky came to us as a visitor, but he became such good friends with Elvis that he stayed.
stories.1: One rainy day, Ricky discovered he loves playing in puddles and now does a happy dance whenever it rains.

teddy.name: Teddy
teddy.character: Teddy is the leader of the herd. He is known for his calm demeanor and friendly nature.

stories.0: Teddy let a 2-year-old girl take him for a walk.
stories.1: During a stormy night, Teddy stood guard over the younger alpacas, showing his true leadership qualities.

suri.name: Suri
suri.character: Suri is very brave, which often leads him to try to dominate the herd.

stories.0: Suri isn't afraid of anything and once spat on Daisy.
stories.1: When we introduced new hay feeders, Suri was the first to figure out how to use them and showed the others.

freddy.name: Freddy
freddy.character: Freddy has a changeable character - sometimes he can snort at guests.

stories.0: Freddy is very intelligent. He quickly learned to ask for food with his foot.
stories.1: During winter, Freddy discovered he loves catching snowflakes with his tongue, making everyone laugh at his playful antics.

lucy.name: Lucy
lucy.character: Lucy is an energetic and loving Yorkshire Terrier. Despite her small size, she has a big personality and loves to keep watch over the farm.

stories.0: Lucy may be tiny, but she takes her job as farm guardian very seriously.
stories.1: She's incredibly gentle with visitors and loves to show them around the farm.

daisy.name: Daisy
daisy.memoriam: Always in our hearts, watching over the alpacas from her favorite spot in the garden.
daisy.character: Daisy was a sweet and friendly dog who loved attention. She's now our guardian angel in the garden.

stories.0: Daisy had a special bond with the baby goats and often watched over them.
stories.1: She is deeply missed by everyone at the farm, especially her alpaca friends.

molly.name: Molly
molly.character: Molly is very loving and playful. She bounces around the garden looking for children to play with.

stories.0: Despite being a newcomer, Molly has already won the hearts of all the farm visitors.
stories.1: She loves chasing bubbles and playing hide and seek in the high grass.

madonna.name: Madonna
madonna.character: Madonna is the diva of the goat herd. She loves attention and often 'sings' to visitors.

stories.0: Madonna once stole a visitor's hat and wore it around the farm for an entire day.
stories.1: She has a habit of standing on the highest point of any structure, as if posing for a photo shoot.

ladygaga.name: Lady Gaga
ladygaga.character: Lady Gaga is known for her unique 'fashion sense', often found wearing flowers or leaves in her fur.

stories.0: Lady Gaga once organized a 'goat parade' where she led the entire herd in a line around the farm.
stories.1: She has a special talent for finding the tastiest leaves and will share them with her goat friends.

nella.name: Nella
nella.character: Nella is the gentle soul of the group. She's particularly good with children and loves cuddles.

stories.0: Nella once comforted a crying child by nuzzling up to them and staying by their side until they smiled.
stories.1: She has a unique friendship with one of the farm cats and they can often be found napping together in the sun.

baron.name: Baron
baron.character: Baron is the dignified leader of the goat herd. He's calm, wise, and protective of the others.

stories.0: Baron once alerted the farmers to a broken fence by repeatedly headbutting the barn door until someone came to check.
stories.1: He has a unique habit of 'escorting' visitors around the farm, walking beside them like a tour guide.

footer.description: Experience the joy of alpaca therapy

intro.p1: Welcome to Zagroda Alpakoterapii. We are committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy.
intro.p2: This Privacy Statement explains how we collect, handle, and protect your personal data, how we use this information, and what rights you have regarding your personal data.
intro.p3: By using our website and services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this Privacy Statement.

messengerData.title: Facebook Messenger Bot Data
messengerData.content: When you interact with our Facebook Messenger bot, we collect and process:
items: Messages you send to our bot
Information necessary for bookings and customer service

dataCollection.title: What personal data we collect and why we collect it

contactForms.title: Contact forms
contactForms.content: For customers wanting to book rooms or activities we will collect information to enable us to contact you and where applicable to pay for the room. For those users that have chosen to receive communications from us we will often use the information supplied within marketing or general communication campaigns.

embeddedContent.title: Embedded content from other websites
embeddedContent.p1: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.
embeddedContent.p2: These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

dataSharing.title: Who we share your data with
dataSharing.content: We do not share your data with any third parties except as necessary to provide our services through Facebook Messenger. Your messages and information are processed in accordance with Facebook's data policies and our service requirements.

dataRetention.title: How long we retain your data
dataRetention.content: For users completing a booking or enquiry we will keep your information for the purposes of that transaction only. We will typically archive information within 3 years of any booking or enquiry. For Messenger bot interactions, messages and related data are retained for up to 3 years.

dataDeletion.title: How to request data deletion
dataDeletion.content: You can request deletion of your data by:
items: Messaging us directly through Facebook Messenger

yourRights.title: What rights you have over your data
yourRights.content: If you have made an enquiry or booking on this site you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

contact.title: Our contact information
contact.content: Our contact email address is admin@zagrodaalpakoterapii.com

metaCrawlers.title: Meta Web Crawlers
metaCrawlers.content: Our website is crawled by Meta's web crawlers for various purposes, including:
items: FacebookExternalHit - for processing content shared on Meta platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Messenger)
Meta-ExternalAgent - for AI model training and product improvement
metaCrawlers.dataCollection: These crawlers may collect information such as:
metaCrawlers.security: For security and integrity purposes, some Meta crawlers may bypass standard access restrictions when performing security checks or verifying content.

technicalRequirements.title: Technical Requirements
technicalRequirements.content: To ensure proper functionality with Meta platforms, our website:
items: Uses gzip and deflate compression for efficient data transfer
Places all Open Graph properties within the first 1 MB of content
Ensures content is quickly accessible for crawler requests
Maintains an allowlist of Meta crawler user agents and IP addresses

social.title: Don't Miss Out!
social.description: Follow us on social media to get special offers on stays and events!
